text.autoconfig.loreutils.title: LoreUtils Configuration
text.autoconfig.loreutils.option.primary: Choose the primary color for mod
text.autoconfig.loreutils.option.alphaPe: Choose the alpha percentage (transparency) for mod
text.autoconfig.loreutils.option.autoSol: Choose whether to automatically solve the Lights Out puzzle when you enter the room.
text.autoconfig.loreutils.option.lightsO: Choose how the solver behaves: All On, All Off, or Strength
text.autoconfig.loreutils.option.autoMar: Choose whether to automatically mark Anuar buttons when you enter the room.
text.autoconfig.loreutils.option.ingenui: Choose whether to show Ingenuity tips.
Choose whether to enable debug mode for Ingenuity. This will show additional information to help solve issues/bugs.
text.autoconfig.loreutils.option.default: What the Lectern "Copy" button does by default: copy the current page or all pages.
RAW keeps § codes and Unicode. FORMATTED looks like the lectern view.
text.autoconfig.loreutils.option.include: Prepend the book's title and author to the exported text.
text.autoconfig.loreutils.option.numberP: Insert visible page numbers into the export.
text.autoconfig.loreutils.option.pageSep: String inserted between pages when copying more than one page.
text.autoconfig.loreutils.option.formatt: Preserve visual page breaks when exporting in FORMATTED mode.
text.autoconfig.loreutils.option.exportT: Additionally save the export under config/loreutils/books/.
text.autoconfig.loreutils.option.filePat: e.g. {title}-{author}-{sha1}.{ext} — tokens are replaced when saving.
